newsitem.title: USA: Chicago developer to announce plans for prime land.
newsitem.headline: Chicago developer to announce plans for prime land.

text.p: A Chicago developer expects to announce plans Tuesday for a residential and commercial complex in a rapidly developing neighborhood north of downtown.

Daniel McLean, president of MCL Construction Corp, has scheduled a news conference for 1100 EDT to release plans for the development of a 13-acre parcel north of the Chicago River between Michigan Avenue and Navy Pier.
MCL affiliate Cityfront Center LLC acquired the parcel after winning a bidding war for Chicago Dock & Canal Trust last year.
The development is expected to include a North Pier commercial and office complex as well and may include a video game arcade directed at adults, according to a Chicago Tribune report.
